attributes.action: Broadcasters should include a climate change segment on every weather forecast
attributes.additional_details:
Bill Giles 
IPCC 
UN Environment
World Bank Group
attributes.background: Human-induced climate change is with us now. Included with the many impacts are changing/extreme weather events. We have a right to know, clearly, why and how, what the short/long-term impacts are and what effect this may have on us and planet Earth - and, importantly, what we can all do about it.

rejection.details: This petition is calling on broadcasters, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.
